message.body: Gabi, we can do regular lesson time tomorrow, if you haven't scheduled something else. Was supposed to rehearse tomorrow and our drummer had a death in the family and services and family stuff takes precedence tomorrow. So let me know if we can do 12 pm. Sorry for the confusion!
Gabi, I trust you'll find us a good room!
Is the 715 sweat lodge ok with you?
Absolutely, I can teach and lose weight at the same time!
